refnamediv.refpurpose: supported and compatible compilers by Scilab

refsection.title: Scilab supported and compatible compilers
refsection.para: Some features of Scilab require that you have a third-party compiler installed on your system.

refsection.title: Windows
refsection.para: -- Visual studio C++ 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019 Professional/Enterprise 32 and 64 bits
-- Visual studio C++ 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019 Express/Community Edition Visual Studio official web site (free of charge)
-- MinGW requires to install a ATOMS module: atomsInstall('mingw');

refsection.title: GNU/Linux
refsection.para: On GNU/Linux, GNU compilers (gcc, g++ and gfortran) are packaged in all distributions.
While they are not officially supported, Scilab supports LLVM/clang and Intel compilers.

refsection.title: Mac OS X
refsection.para: Apple's development environment for OS X, Xcode, is available from Apple at no charge.
